title: Ecommerce and lending platform
description: Today SMBs in India face a lot of problems like an aggressive promotional strategy from big eCommerce, lending, fraud detection,  SCM, etc

f6_assessments.q0: The project wants to establish an ecommerce and lendigplatform for medium sized businesses on the blockchain. The problem that should be solved is that medium sized businesses in india face "aggressive big players". That to me sounds not as a reasonable motivation. Especially as the projects mentions "fraud detection" as a problem for small businesses.
f6_assessments.q1: The project owner has "zero experience" in ecommerce.  There is no road map, no specifications on how the platform will look like.
f6_assessments.q2: The sole description of the project is basically "ecommerce platform". It is not auditable, there is no roadmap. There is no definition of success and the owner has zero knowlegde of ecommerce.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal highlighted a problem and offered a solution however the proposal needs more details.
I disagree.
